apexlink:check.description: Validate Apex code in current or passed directories

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

depends.name: depends
depends.description: output class dependencies rather than issues, in CSV (default) or JSON format

args.name: directory
args.description: directory to search for metadata files, defaults to current directory

apexlink:gulp.description: Download metadata to enable apex-link semantic analysis

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

namespaces.name: namespaces
namespaces.description: gulp metadata for these namespaces, unmanaged metadata is gulped by default

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command
